entry.title: WIND WARNING , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 6:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: 8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 7.1°C
Wind: ESE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Showers at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 early in the morning then light near noon. High 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Rain beginning in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
